Comments.GROUP NAME: There can be many groups, but each must have unique name. Also, can contain multiple objects/jobs.

action.add_missing_values: Replaces all values equal to 'default_value' with values from 'template_file'.
action.set_all_to_default: Create file with all keys and values set to 'default_value'.

Comments.default_value: Value to be used if key doesn't exist.
Comments.template_file: Template file, to which 'input_file' is compared.
Comments.input_file: File that program modifies, not used by 'set_all_to_default'.
